Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: initial project setup with documentation

- Add CLAUDE.md with project vision, architecture, and guidelines
- Add comprehensive docs/ with 14 documentation files covering:
  - Architecture, stack, security \(OWASP 2025\)
  - UX guidelines, API spec, deployment
  - Sync protocol, FRICTIONLESS manifest
  - Features roadmap and marketing specs
- Add agent context files \(CLAUDE-BACKEND, CLAUDE-FRONTEND, CLAUDE-DEVOPS\)
- Add TypeScript API contracts
- Add CHANGELOG and CONTRIBUTING guides
- Add .gitignore for .NET, Node.js, and IDE files

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\FranciscoAlvizo\\Documents\\Dev\\CAgentCloud" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(M1\): add JWT packages to Infrastructure layer

TokenService.cs uses System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt classes but the
packages were only referenced in Api project, causing Docker build to fail.

Added packages:
- Microsoft.IdentityModel.Tokens v8.3.1
- System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Jwt v8.3.1

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker compose -f ''c:\\Users\\FranciscoAlvizo\\Documents\\Dev\\CAgentCloud\\docker\\docker-compose.yml'' exec frontend npm run build")

Bash(git -C "c:\\Users\\FranciscoAlvizo\\Documents\\Dev\\CAgentCloud" commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
